Plot: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.
Title: My Summer of Love
Writer: Helen Cross (novel), Pawel Pawlikowski, Michael Wynne (collaborating writer)
Actors: Natalie Press, Emily Blunt, Paddy Considine, Dean Andrews
tomatoConsensus: My Summer of Love is a moody, bittersweet love story featuring outstanding performances from the leads.
